alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 19 at 2:19AM MST until February 19 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, west winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. For the High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 5 AM MST early this morning. For the High Wind Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains
